title: Décolletage Rejuvenation
description: Polynucleotides, skin boosters, and LED therapy reverse crepey texture, sun spots, and fine lines across the chest.
longDescription: Your chest is often exposed to sun and fragrance but rarely gets the same care as your face. We combine injectable hydrators, PN-HPT biostimulants, and LED light to thicken dermal tissue, fade pigmentation, and restore a glassy sheen—perfect for open-neck outfits and bridal looks.
